name: Pasture Canyon (Pothole Fork)
description:
Introduction

A short tributary of Pasture Canyon's east fork - it has 3 potholes right at the end.

Approach

Best to park at the end of the dirt road above Bull Canyon's west fork, overlooking Bull and Pasture Canyon's east fork.

Descent

Exit

Walk down Pasture canyon's east fork until the junction with the west fork. On the eastern side you can route-find up to teh rim with some help from cowboy hacked steps on the way

Red tape

None, BLM land

Beta sites

  • RoadTripRyan.com : Pasture Canyon

Trip reports and media
